title: When AI and Secure Chat Meet, Users Deserve Strong Controls Over How They Interact
summary: The article discusses the intersection of artificial intelligence (AI) and secure messaging platforms, emphasizing the need for robust user controls in their interaction. With the increasing integration of AI technologies into secure messaging systems, there are concerns about data privacy and user security. The article argues that users should have the ability to determine how their data is used and be assured of its confidentiality, advocating for transparent AI models and stringent privacy measures. These controls ensure that while users can benefit from enhanced communication tools, their personal information remains protected

title: Memory-Efficient Backpropagation for Fine-Tuning LLMs on Resource-Constrained Mobile Devices
summary: The article discusses innovative techniques for memory-efficient backpropagation, aimed at fine-tuning large language models (LLMs) specifically on resource-constrained mobile devices. By addressing the typical hardware limitations of mobile platforms, the authors propose methodologies that significantly reduce the memory footprint during the backpropagation process. These techniques enable the deployment and efficient training of sophisticated language models on devices with limited computational resources, thus expanding the accessibility and application of LLMs beyond traditional high-end computing environments. title: Joint Statement on the UN Cybercrime Convention: EFF and Global Partners Urge Governments Not to Sign
summary: The article discusses a joint statement issued by the Electronic Frontier Foundation (EFF) and various global partners urging governments not to sign the proposed United Nations Cybercrime Convention. title: Harden your identity defense with improved protection, deeper correlation, and richer context
summary: The article "Harden your identity defense with improved protection, deeper correlation, and richer context" discusses the latest advancements in identity security measures. It highlights the importance of strengthening identity defenses by integrating enhanced protective strategies, improving the ability to correlate data across various sources, and providing richer contextual insights into identity-related activities.
